CustomField.description: Created this field to track the Package discount for items on OLI
CustomField.formula: IF( Part_of_a_package__c = TRUE, (MAX(List_Price_ARR_One_off__c * Quantity, Default_Price_ARR__c * Quantity, Sales_Price_ARR__c * Quantity) - MAX(Default_Price_ARR__c * Quantity, Sales_Price_ARR__c * Quantity)),0)
CustomField.label: SpotDraft Package Discount
